body_html:
@oneTaken Yes I forgot to share my findings here. Been a busy month at work.
I found out that the problem was not with the tensor , but with numpy encoding. For each array I was creating I specified the data type to int32 and I was able to debug the issue. It would have been better though if tensorflow documented this error better as the error statement is of no help, it required a lot of reading of the code and hit and trial to debug and finally find the issue.
Thanks for your help.
